alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Potential for funnel cloud formation in west central Bristol, northeastern Washington, northern Newport, Kent, southeastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Exeter, or 9 miles northwest of South Kingstown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Funnel cloud. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If storm continues to intensify, it may produce a brief tornado. Locations impacted include... Providence, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, East Providence, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, South Kingstown, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, North Kingstown, Bristol, Attleboro, Lincoln, Central Falls, Somerset, Barrington and Swansea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent
